base_description: Rectangular window with four blue glass panels.
part_description: Four vertical blue glass panels framed in white, arranged side by side within a rectangular frame.
internal_interaction_description: The four glass panels are fixed within the white frame, separated by vertical dividers that provide structural support and maintain spacing between each panel, ensuring stability and uniformity.
external_interaction_description: The window allows light to pass through while providing a barrier against external elements. It can be opened or closed to regulate airflow and temperature, interacting with the environment and occupants of a building.
